name: BICOLOR PINPRES
description:
(100x47x105 cm)


Wouldn’t it be nice to live in a world that adapted to our whims at the snap of a finger? Alas, such luxuries may only be dreams, but the ingenious PinPres comes pretty close. The shelving unit is constructed of finely chiselled, locally forested beech wood pegs that can be arranged in any which way to fit any shelving needs—books, decorations, eyeglasses, cell phone. Just think of it as interactive storage art—art, that is, designed just for you, in a configuration you can paint and colour at will. 

You can customize the colors!

name: CASSETTE TAPES FLOOR LAMP
description:
CASSETTE'S NOT DEAD. Floor lamp 120x 20 x 20 cm.

Tribute to cassette tape, which kept us company all trough the 80ies and became a symbol of a generation. Taking advantage of
its structural properties, a lamp/box has been created only by means of tying the tapes firmly together. The lamp dims the light in a soft delicate way and you can play with it changing the tapes even with yours  and  listening all of them too!!

Each piece is unique, exclusive and hand made.

Homenaje a las cintas que nos han acompañado en los 80s y constituyen el símbolo de una generación. Aprovechando las propiedades estructurales, se crea una caja lámpara ,hecha integramente con cassetes y bridas. Lámpara que tamiza la luz dando unos tonos muy cálidos y con la que puedes jugar cambiando los cassettes por los tuyos propios y escuchandolos tambien!!

Cada pieza es única, exclusiva y está hecha a mano.

name: GVAL CHAIR
description:
(66x40x75 cm)

GVAL is a product that brings surprising and playful use to an object as ordinary as everyday's chair.

The form of the chair is a careful balance of many requirements:  ergonomic demands to fit the human body in a variety of positions, modularity of pieces that can fit together like a puzzle in a variety of ways, and also intention to create an abstract form that radiates sense of lightness, familiarity and invitation to  touch, use and play with it.

GVAL chair easily transforms and adopts to different spaces, situations and needs: not only can it be used in both public and private spaces, indoors and outdoors, small and large rooms, it can be a simple compact chair or expand to become a lounge chair with ottoman, or even can lend itself to uses that go beyond seating: a low table, or a shelf.

From the beginning, we were led by the quote by Leonardo de Vinci:
“Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication”.
GVAL is a result of intention to distill various complex technical and functional requirements into a simple object. And it is not simplicity for its own sake: GVAL chair is simple to make, simple to understand and simple to use. This not only makes this chair a feasible, economical and efficient product, but also the product with sincere and light character: the one that looks instantly familiar yet refreshingly new and playful. 

Designed by OOO My Design with Gustavo Reboredo and Louis Sicard.
Manufactured by Ducampus.

First prize of the category Making Chairs of the interational competition Art On Chairs, awarded by the Paredes Center of Furniture Design.

Special introductory promotion, free shipping cost.

name: PINPRES MINI
description: (50x35x50cm) PinPres Mini is a modular shelving system easily mounted to walls that allows you to enjoy the Pin Pres experience everywhere; at home, shops, libraries, offices, restaurants ... PinPres Mini transforms any wall into an amazing piece of Op Art, creating endless optical effects by combination of its changing form and vivid colors. PinPres Mini measures 50 x 50 cm and is contains 95 adjustable pins, and is made of beech wood coated in water resistent paint. Designed by OOO My Design® +info: www.pin-pres.com PinPres Mini es un sistema modular que se adapta a cualquier pared y permite disfrutar de la experiencia Pin Pres en el hogar, comercios, librerías, oficinas, restaurantes... PinPres Mini viste cualquier pared de un efecto óptico increible como una pieza Op Art que combina sus colores con sus formas. PinPres Mini mide 50 x 50 cm y esta formado por 95 Pins de madera de haya pintados por inmersión en pintura inocua. Diseñado por OOO My Design® +info: www.pin-pres.com

name: JUST FOLD
description:
(175x178cm)

It is flexible, easy to assemble and disassemble, and the individual models fold compact making them convenient to store or transport. The length of the screen can be adjusted by adding or subtracting the number of modules. Perforations on the surface increase stability by counteracting wind resistance in addition to varying the porosity which creates a nice visual effect that varies depending on the angle and distance from which it is viewed.

Designed by Kutarq

name: BBL LAMP
description:
(36x36x57 cm)

This pendant lamp is characterised by an enormous bulb shape made up of thirty two perforated discs with different diameters connected by nylon cables and separated by transparent small tubes. 
The main light is hidden between the discs, which make a multiple light filter, creating an indirect and diffused light. The separators enable it to maintain a horizontal display as well as the two centimeter distance between each part. 
With the bulb easily changed by lifting the upper discs, it can also be packed flat into small boxes, making it easily transportable too.

Designed by Kutarq


<iframe src="https://vimeo.com/44695409 title=0&byline=0&portrait=0&color=66ff00&autoplay=1" width="220" height="99" frameborder="0"></iframe>

name: HIPSTER CERAMIC
description:
Not your grandma’s ceramic! These are hand decorated premium quality porcelain plates with Vitrified Decals. Dishwasher and microwave safe – every hipster’s dream come true!

Platos de porcelana de primera calidad decorados a mano con calcas vitrificables.
Apto para lavavajillas y microondas.

name: I WILL SURIVE
description:
If your plants could sign plantpot. PART I.
I was afraid...but..
 
I WILL SURVIVE

Handmade Plantpot
H 14 cm ø17 cm
 
Pack: Highly resistant cardboard printed box.

Designed by 24dientes.

Si las plantas pudiesen cantar. PARTE I.
I was afraid but...
 
I WILL SURVIVE

Hecho a mano.
H 14 cm ø17 cm
 
PaPack: Caja impresa de cartón super resistente.

Diseñado por 24dientes.

name: PINPRES
description: (100 x 47 x 105 cm) PinPres is a kid’s room shelf that makes the act of sorting up the room a playful experience where the shelf adopts its form to the toys, books and other things that are being stored. Its the only shelf that will make your kid actually want to clean up and declutter the room! There are various materials options for your PinPres: - Main body can be of natural pine plywood, or white lackquered - Pins can be of natural beechwood, or stained by immersion in one of the 4 colors. 100% Handmade Pin Pres with custom dimensions can be produced on request to fit your specific requirements (pricing may vary). Delivery time approx. 30 days. + info: www.pin-pres.com

name: REVERSIBLE TABLE
description:
(120x120x100cm)

The Reversible table is an innovative and versatile piece; it uniquely offers you a double function combined with elegance of design. It is easily adaptable for many occasions, appealing to modern living in domestic spaces. It works as well as a dining table (73 cm height) and a coffee table (35 cm height). 
You can change the height of the table simply flipping it 180º, easily done by two people as it is strong, but light. 
The legs, that cross the board of the table, have a double function: aesthetic, and functional. We can use the outgoing part of each leg for coat rack to hang purses, hats, accessories… 
The pieces of the table can be dismantled in a flat pack to save costs of transport.

Type: 
dinning and coffee table 
Product dimensions: 
Ø120 cm diameter 
Used as dinning table: 73 cm height 
Used as coffe table: 35 cm height 
Materials: 
30mm thick lacquered spruce plywood and Ø40mm steel tubes. Legs finished in natural oak. 
Weight: 
23 kg 
Designed by Kutarq

name: TIC TAC TOE
description:
(11,5x15 cm)

Beech wood pencil holder. PLAY PENCILS VS. PENS!
Take a break at work with this fun Tic Tac Toe pencil holder, your deserve it.
 
Designed by 24 Dientes

name: KING OF POP MATRIOSKA
description:
Designed as traditional matryoshka dolls (which have smaller versions hidden inside progressively getting smaller as you go through the layers), King of Pop chronicles different iconic looks that Michael Jackson had throughout his career.

OOO My Design’s King of Pop starts off with a layer depicting a pale-skinned Michael that resembles the look he carried at the end of his career. The next layers include an homage to his famous thriller music video, and the look that he started with when he first hit the music scene with the Jackson 5.

These three figures represent the major life stages of one of the worlds most well-known pop stars. Michael Jackson truly was the King of Pop.

name: CACTUS SERIES
description:
Rack shaped cactus with different sizes made ​​from beech and pine.

(60x40x185cm) It has seven arms hangers
(42x42x90cm) With three arms hangers
(25x18x18cm) To hang keys, sunglasses, jewelry, etc. ...

Designed by Andrés Aceves

Perchero con forma de cactus de diferentes tamaños realizados en madera de haya y pino.

(60x40x185cm) Posee siete brazos colgadores
(42x42x90cm)  Con tres brazos colgadores
(25x18x18cm) Para colgar llaves, gafas, joyas, etc...

Diseñado por Andrés Aceves

name: SCENERY RINGS
description:
Imaging histories, creating scenes...
Set of three acrylic rings. 
What do you prefer, town or country?

name: MOVING INTO THE FUTURE
description:
The collection, Moving into the future? Is made up for designs half animal and half weapons. These hybrid designs look like fantasy characters between funny and frightening.
These are ceramics made in moulds by squeezing. For the finish, she use transparent glaze to highlight the designs textures.
The light bulb, does not blind, its light is warm.

Designed by Rayadura de Sandia.

Colección ¿Caminando hacia el futuro? Son diseños de híbridos animal-armamento parecen personajes de fantasía entre lo cómico y lo aterrador.
Son objetos cerámicos realizados en moldes por apretón con un acabado esmalte transparente para realzar las texturas de los diseños.
La bombilla se incorpora al diseño, no deslumbra, dando una luz cálida
en el ambiente.

Diseñado por Rayadura de Sandia

name: PARANOID CRITICAL MUG
description:
(11x7x10cm)

This mug, made of the finest Spanish porcelain, is based on the paranoid critical theory of  painter Salvador Dali: there are different realities depending on the way you see.
Handmade using intaglio technique in limited series.
Dishwasher and microwave safe.

name: FAUNEALEA POSTCARD-EARRINGS
description:
(10x15 cm)

Flat-Pack Plywood and Acrilyc Earrings You Assemble Yourself.
You don’t need an Allen wrench to bring these earrings to life. Made by OOO My Design in Spain, the space-saving ear hooks ship flat like a postcard, ready to be assembled into a wearable menagerie of horses, flamingos, rhinos, poodles, cows, turkeys, and kangaroos. Use the remaining “stencil” to clone your critters from corrugated cardboard and stage a diorama—or several.


Different animals:
-Horse
-Flamingo
-Rhino
-Poodle
-Cow
-Turkey
-Kangaroo

Materials: acrilyc and pine plywood


FREE DELIVERY

name: C-LAMP
description:
(25x25x70cm) 

A lamp made out of a clamp.
You can tighten it where ever you like and place it in the position you prefer. It is very functional and fits harmoniously in all kind of settings, modern as classical. Its beauty comes from the juxtaposition of counterparts: the strength of the clamp with the weightlessness of the light.  It has been one of the finalist project in the international design competition "Trieste contemporanea", edition 2012.

Designed by G10design.


C-lamp esta fabricada a partir del F-clamp, una de las abrazaderas mas fiables del mercado. C-lamp es muy simple, pero es una lámpara-abrazadera o una abrazadera-lámpara? 
C-lamp ha sido uno de los proyectos finalistas del concurso internacional de diseño ìContemporanea Triesteî en 2012.
Puedes sujetarla donde quieras, en la posición que más te guste, apretarla, y listo! C-lamp se produce a pequeña escala y con materiales locales. Es muy funcional y encaja armoniosamente en todo tipo de entornos, tanto moderno como clásico. Su belleza proviene de la yuxtaposición de las partes: la fuerza de la abrazadera metálica y la ingravidez de la luz.

Diseñado por G10design

name: CANDELMOBIL
description:
(11 x 11 x 9 cm)


Our dear friends always help! This time they do it by holding candles!

An important part of my work is based on the reuse of the icons of my childhood. My favorite toy was "Clicks" and I took some time thinking about the best use for them. I've finally decided to join us in giving light in the most environmentally friendly way, with candles.

Candel holder made ​​of three figures coated with latex and varnished in chrome or gold finish. Each piece is unique.

Designed by OOO My Design.

Nuestros entrañables amigos siempre ayudandonos! Esta vez lo hacen sujetando velas!

Una parte importante de mi trabajo se basa en la reutilización de los iconos de mi infancia. Mi juguete favorito eran los "Clicks" y yo llevo ya tiempo pensando en el mejor uso para ellos. Por fin me he decidido a que nos ayuden dando luz de la forma más ecológica; con velas.

Candelabro formado por figuras bañadas en latex y con efecto cromo y oro en el acabado. Piezas unicas.

Diseño de OOO My Design.

name: CASSETTE EARRINGS
description:
(3 cm)

Earrings with cassette shape made of acrilyc.

Cassette fever is going on!

name: CASSETTE NECKLACE
description:
Cassette shape made of acrylic (10x6cm)
Metalic Necklace (50cm)

name: CASSETTE TAPES FLOOR LAMP. Special edition
description:
(22x20x120 cm)

Special edition made of colored transparent tapes.
Unique piece.
Cassette's not dead!!!!

name: NOSTALGIC CHAIR/SILLA CASSETTE
description:
Elvis Presley, Madonna, ABBA, New Wave… Remembering all those artists that we grew up with...
With a walkman attached to its side, Nostalgic Chair pays a tribute to now obsolete medium of cassette tape, which was the first to introduce mobility to music reproduction as well as the first recording medium that permitted us to create our own personalizad mix tapes.
Long live the Tape!

Very comfortable and durable (120 kg).
Minimum order 2 units.

Enrique y Ana, Mecano, Mº Jesús y su acordeón… Volver a recordar aquellos grupos que nos acompañaron en tantos momentos y nos vieron crecer.
Con un walkman en su cinturón, esta nostálgica silla rinde un tributo al ya obsoleto cassette, que fue el primer medio de reproducción que nos dio movilidad y el primer medio de grabación que nos permitió crear nuestras propias recopilaciones.
Hasta siempre Cassette!!

Muy cómoda y resistente (120 kg)
Pedido mínimo 2 unidades.

options.name: Steel tubular frame(40x41x83 cm)  Minimun 2 units

name: LUCEDERA
description:
Lucedera, a simple block of wood, will conquer your space filling it with a natural sensation.
When you switch it on the light will pass through the thin wood skin and bring you the warmth of nature.
Each Lucedera is unique. The handcrafted process together with the natural wood structure make every piece different.
There are 2 options: Lucedera 4 , with replaceble shades, and Lucedera 1, made only of wood.
The Lucedera 4 comes with 2 set shades.

Designed by G10design

Lucedera, un simple bloque de madera, conquistará su espacio con una sensación natural.
Cuando se enciende la luz pasará a través de la piel de la madera fina aportando la calidez de la naturaleza.
Cada Lucedera es única. El proceso artesanal junto con la estructura de madera natural hacen de cada pieza diferente.

Hay 2 opciones: Lucedera 4, con 2 tonos y Lucedera 1 que se realiza sólo de madera.

Diseñado por G10design

name: INGRAVITTO
description: (65x65x2 cm) Ingravitto is a personal organizer for young and fun people. You can placed objects in it, above all what are commonly used and you want to have in view, for example, do not forget that before you have to get out of. This product arises from the need to place multiple objects that have young people in an "organized" and taking up little space. It allows customization in colors or textures. Designed by Daniel García www.danielgarciasanchez.com Ingravitto es un organizador de objetos personales orientado hacia la gente joven y divertida. Se colocan en ella objetos que se usan habitualmente y que deseas tener a la vista, por ejemplo, para no olvidarte que antes de salir los tienes que coger. Este producto surge de la necesidad de colocar los múltiples objetos que tenemos las personas jóvenes de una manera “ordenada“ y ocupando poco espacio. Se permite la personalización en colores o texturas del trablero y en colores del cordón elástico. Diseñado por Daniel García www.danielgarciasanchez.com

name: KA LAMP
description: (190x95x60cm) Ka Lamp is a reading lamp made of wood. Warmth and tradition transmitted by the use of wood but at the same time innovation and thoughtfully designed. The use of elastic cord as assemble system gives the product innovation and distinction. The focus turns on its axis as it supports the arm, giving the product a total freedom to distribute light. Ka Lamp is modular, removable and easily transportable and takes up very little space. Designed by Daniel García www.danielgarciasanchez.com Ka Lamp es una luminaria de lectura realizada en madera de haya. Trasmite calidez y tradición por el uso de la madera pero a la vez frescura y un diseño cuidado. El uso del cordón elástico como sistema de unión dota al producto de innovación y distinción. El foco gira en su eje al igual que el brazo que le soporta, dotando al producto de una libertad total para distribuir la luz. Ka Lamp es modular, desmontable y fácilmente trasportable ocupando muy poco espacio. Diseñado por Daniel García www.danielgarciasanchez.com

name: LEGSTALK
description:
Legs with Attitude. 
Demure, cheeky, vain, passionate... 
How do you feel today?
Tights whithout foot. 140 DEN
Demure, discreet, subtle, playful, 
sensual, impulsive, seductive, 
provocative, daring, passionate, 
cheeky, dangerous, femme fatal.
Item available in English and Spanish.

Designed and manufactured by Veinticuatro Dientes

Piernas con carácter. ¿Recatada? 
¿Atrevida? ¿Coqueta? ¿Guerrera?
¿Cómo vas hoy?
Medias opacas. Den: 140. Sin pie.
Recatada, discreta, sutil, coqueta, 
sensual, caprichosa, seductora, 
provocadora, atrevida, descarada, 
guerrera, fatal.
Producto disponible en Español e Inglés.

Diseñado y fabricado por Veinticuatro dientes.

name: NOTE ME
description:
(35x35 cm)
Call me. I love you. Buy milk... 
Write and erase all the messages 
you want on this cushion. To erase
remove pillowcase and rinse under 
cold water. Doesn’t need soap. 
Pen included.

Designed and manufactured by Veinticuatro Dientes.

Llámame. Te quiero. Compra 
leche. Escribe y borra todos los
mensajes que quieras sobre este
cojín. Para borrar, quita la funda
y pásala por agua fría. No necesita
jabón. Incluye rotulador.

Diseñado y fabricado por Veinticuatro Dientes.

name: PILLOW NO FIGHT
description:
This pack contains 2 pillowcases: 
"mine" and "yours".
Stop fighting over the pillow. 
Pick one and sleep tight.
 
Size adjusted to standarts:
English: 19.5 x 27.3 inch - 50 x 70 cm
Spanish: 50 x 70 cm 
Deutsch: 80 x 80 cm

Composition:
50% Cotton
50% Polyester

Designed and manufactured by Veinticuatro Dientes.

2 fundas de almohada 50 x 70 cm c/u

2 fundas de almohada: ‘tuya’ y ‘mía’.
Deja claro de quién es cada una
y que no te la quiten más.
Por una noche entera con tu almohada.

Producto disponible en Inglés y Español.
Diseñado y fabricado por Veinticuatro Dientes.

name: COLORFULNIGHT
description:
8 toothbrushes to say goodbye, 
to distinguish, to repeat… to do 
whatever you want. You’ll be ready 
to have any guest!

Designed and manifactured by Veinticuatro Dientes

8 cepillos de dientes para despedir, 
para distinguir, para repetir… para lo 
que tú quieras. Cuando tengas a 
alguien en casa, ¡despreocúpate!

Diseñado y fabricado por Veinticuatro Dientes

name: MOSS PENCIL
description:
The 'moss pencil' is a wooden pencil covered with green flocking.
It make you feel really happy  writing and enjoy it. 
Especially useful for vagrant children. 

Designed by I'm Curio (Thailand).
Reddot awards 2008 winner.

El lápiz de musgo es un lápiz de madera cubierto por símil de musgo.
Te hace sentir realmente feliz cuando escribes y disfrutarlo.
Especialmente útil para niños vagos.

Diseñado por I'm Curio (Tailandia)
Producto ganador del Reddot 2008.

name: CASSETTE IPHONE CASE
description:
(11.3 cm x 6.2 cm x 1.1 cm)

This red Cassette iPhone Case is a retro silicone case for your iPhone 4. Take a trip back in time with the cassette iPhone case, which is sure to arouse nostalgia among friends and spark conversations with new people.

- Color: Red or black
- Unique retro cassette tape style designed
- Conveniently to access and remove
- Anti-skidding ability perfectly fits iPod Touch 4 or iPhone 4 & 4S
- Can protect the frame of your iPhone from abrasion
- All interface, ports and buttons available for directly use (except the charging/data port)


Weight: 0.88 oz (25 g)

name: FOOSBALL HERO
description:
Foosball Hero brings adrenaline rush of the real-world foosball game to your iPad ! It's fast, noisy, engaging, rusty, dirty and squeaky - just like the old foosball table at your favorite bar !

To purchase go to the site: 
<a href="http://itunes.apple.com/app/foosballhero/id390969192">www.foosballhero.com

A game by nenad katic

name: TAMGRAM
description:
(20x20x3 cm)

Two games in one: Mecanical device and tamgram.

Designed by MiniArquitectura.

name: FLIP-SOCKS
description:
Have fun and show off with these stylish flip flop socks. Ideal for summer nights on the beach, go to crowded places and have the fingers always protected. Very comfortable and wearable.



Sizes 
UK 5-7
US 6-8
UE 37-40

100%  Cotton

Divierte y presume con estos elegantes calcetines para chancla. Ideal para las noches de verano en la playa, entrar a sitios concurridos y tener siempre protegidos los deditos. Muy cómodos y ponibles.

Tallas 37-40
100% Algodón

name: POST-IT LAMP
description:
Lamp made with Velcro and a additional alphabet to write your messages and don't forget anything.
Mouth blown glass; each lamp is unique.
An energy-saving 20W bulb is suitable for use
Product dimensions
Diameter: 10 "
Height: 9 "
Cord length: 6 ' 7 "

Diameter: 25 cm
Height: 23 cm
Cord length: 2.0 m


Lámpara de Velcro con un alfabeto adicional para escribir tus mensajes y no olvidar nada.
Vidrio de soplado artesanal. Cada lámpara es única.
Se recomienda usar una bombilla de bajo consumo de 20W.
Medidas del producto: 

diámetro: 25 cm
Altura: 23 cm
longitud del cable: 2.0 m

name: BOTTLE FLOWER LAMP
description:
(30x30x60 cm)

FLOWER is a room lamp made from PET soda bottles, stones and a beautiful decorative ceramic pot. It is very flirtatious and protagonist in any space where it is installed, creating a suggestive atmosphere very light and romantic.

The locations of the house that it likes, are the console from the receiver, the sideboard in the dining room or bedroom dresser.

It also worries about the health of the planet, so it's made of two reused PET bottles up to 95%. Its water-based paint is free of solvents and gases too.

Designed by Victor Obrador
www.victorobrador.com

FLOWER es una lámpara de salón realizada a partir de botellas de refresco de PET, piedras residuales de cantera de mármol decorativas y una bonita maceta cerámica.Es muy coqueta y protagoniza cualquier espacio donde se instala, creando una luz de ambiente muy sugerente y romántica.Los lugares de la casa que más le gustan son la consola del recibidor, el aparador del comedor, o la cómoda del dormitorio.

También se preocupa por la salud del planeta, por lo que dos botellas de PET reutilizadas al 95% conforman la flor de pantalla. Su pintura es de base acuosa sin disolventes ni gases nocivos.

Diseño de Victor Obrador
www.victorobrador.com

name: POCKET VASE
description:
The Pocket Vase was designed to address the age-old problem of people everywhere you receive or pick a flower but don’t have a suitable vase for a single stem. The spring steel design remains flat until you need it. Just bend it in place to transform a glass or coffee mug into a fashionable vase. When not in use, Pocket Vase springs back for flat, easy storage.
Materials:
Stainless Spring Steel & Rubber

Designed by The Other Edge

Pocket Vase ha sido diseñado para abordar el problema de toda persona que recibe una flor y no tiene donde ponerla. El diseño del resorte de acero permanece plano hasta que lo necesita. Sólo tiene que doblarlo y convertirá su vaso o taza en un elegante jarrón. Cuando no se use, Pocket Vase recupera su forma plana para un mejor almacenamiento.

Diseño de The Other Edge

name: STRESS BEATER
description:
(10 cm x 7.5 cm x 2 cm)
Don't take it out on the guy who cut you off on the way into the office or that irritating co-worker there are better ways to handle stress. Slip on a Stress Beater and squeeeeeze. It has all the hardedged visual appeal of brass knuckles, combined with the stress-reducing properties of a basket of kittens. Now squeeze some more its submissive soft feel and comforting fingerholes will have you seeing rainbows. Ahhhhh!!!!

Designed by The Other Edge

No se la tome con el tipo que te corta el camino en la oficina o con el irritente compañero de trabajo, ya que hay mejores maneras de manejar el stress. Ponte un Stress Beater y relax. Tiene todo el atractivo visual de un puño americano, combinado con las propiedades de reducción de estrés de una canasta de gatitos. Ahora aprieta un poco más y tendrá que ver el arco iris. Ahhhhh!!!!!

Diseño de The Other Edge.

name: CASSETTE HYPERCUBE
description:
(40x36x40 cm)

Cassette addiction!. Now backlit table. Limited edition.

name: CASSETTE TAPES LAMP BOX
description:
CASSETTE'S NOT DEAD
22x22x20 cm.
Tribute to music tape, which kept us all trough the 80ies and became a
symbol of a generation. Taking advantage of its structural properties, a lamp/box has been created only by means of tying the tapes firmly together. The lamp dims the light in a soft delicate way, and contains a storage space as well. Also you can play with it changing the tapes even with yours and listening all of them too.

Homenaje a las cintas que nos han acompañado en los 80s y constituyen el símbolo de una generación. Aprovechando las propiedades estructurales, se crea una caja lámpara ,hecha integramente con cassetes y bridas. Lámpara que tamiza la luz dando unos tonos muy cálidos y con la que puedes jugar cambiando los cassettes por los tuyos propios y escuchandolos tambien.

options.name: White Tapes Pendant Lamp/Lámpare techo cintas blancas
Colour Tapes Pendant Lamp/Lámpare techo cintas colores

name: CASSETTE TAPES LAMP BOX (Transparent)
description:
CASSETTE'S NOT DEAD
22x22x20 cm.

Tribute to music tape, which kept us
company all trough the 80ies and became a
symbol of a generation. Taking advantage of
its structural properties, a lamp/box has been
created only by means of tying the tapes firmly
together. The lamp dims the light in a soft delicate
way, and contains a storage space as
well. Also you can play with it changing the tapes even with yours and listening all of them too.

name: KRASZNAI BOWL
description:
(23x16x9 cm)

We say Hello! to Krasznai.A young Studio from Barcelona. All the works we produce are handmade and slipcasted ceramics, each one of them
a little bit different from the others. At least we like to think that they all have their own behaviour. Our new collection is called
“Arms&Crafts” and you can see all these things in it. But the main aim with the works is to have fun and, if possible, bring a smile to
your face.”

Damos la bienvenida a Krasznai. Un joven estudio de Barcelona que realiza cerámica artesanal. Su última colección está llamada "Brazos y artesania", que trata de divertir y llevar una sonrisa a nuestras caras.

name: KRASZNAI  MILK
description:
(15x22x11 cm)

We say Hello! to Krasznai.A young Studio from Barcelona. All the works we produce are handmade and slipcasted ceramics, each one of them a little bit different from the others. At least we like to think that they all have their own behaviour. Our new collection is called
“Arms&Crafts” and you can see all these things in it. But the main aim with the works is to have fun and, if possible, bring a smile to
your face.”
Put water into the ceramic brick to get allways fresh.

Damos la bienvenida a Krasznai. Un joven estudio de Barcelona que realiza cerámica artesanal. Su última colección está llamada "Brazos y artesania", que trata de divertir y llevar una sonrisa a nuestras caras. 
Pon agua dentro del brick de cerámica para tenerla siempre fresca!

name: PETIT YOGOURT LAMP
description:
A lamp born in a CUT AND PASTE project. The project based on recycling of plastic attempted to give a new cycle to the waste, adding a great new value to the packaging.
From this intention a PETIT YOGOURT was conceived; a unique lamp that gives warmth with style to any ambient.
Diameter 35cm


Lámpara nacida en el proyecto CORTAR Y PEGAR. Este proyecto está basado en el reciclaje del plástico y pretende dar un nuevo ciclo a los residuos, dotando así de un gran valor al elemento envase.

Con esta intención se crea PETIT YOGOURT; lámpara única y que da calidez y estilo a cualquier ambiente.
Diámetro 40 cm.

name: VOODOO KNIFE BLOCK/CUCHILLERO VOODOO
description:
(40 x 30 cm)

Thankfully there's nothing supernatural about the Voodoo Knife Block, even though it is one of the most amusingly bizarre kitchen accessories we've ever seen. Designed by Raffaele Lannello. 

Crafted in rich red, black or chrome coloured ABS plastic, the highly stylish Voodoo has five strategically-positioned slots in which to place five quality knives, which are also included.

Apart from its striking appearance the sturdy Voodoo is a brilliant kitchen companion, especially if you're used to using one crummy knife to chop, slice, fillet and dice. The five assorted knives included with the Voodoo are super sleek and guaranteed to bring out your inner-Ramsay. You'll soon be chopping ultra-thin onions just for the hell of it.


Afortunadamente no hay nada de sobrenatural en el Bloque de cuchillos vudú, a pesar de que es uno de los más divertidos accesorios de cocina  que hemos visto. Diseñado por Raffaele Lannello.

Hecho a mano en ricos rojo, negro o cromo de plástico ABS, el Voodoo de gran estilo tiene cinco ranuras estratégicamente posicionadas en donde colocar cinco cuchillos de calidad, que también están incluidos.

Aparte de su aspecto llamativo el cuchillero Voodoo  es un compañero de la cocina brillante, sobre todo si estás acostumbrado a usar un cuchillo, a cortar, rebanar, filete y dados. El lote de cinco cuchillos que incluye c el vudú es súper elegante y garantizado para sacar su interior-Ramsay. Dentro de poco podrás cortar cebollas ultra-delgadas sólo por el placer de hacerlo.

name: LEGO LAMP
description:
Serie of lamps made from recycled parts that belong to the action CUT AND PASTE, where we try to reuse waste, giving them a new cycle and creating as many things as possible. Unique piezes
(35x14 cm)

Serie de lámparas hechas con piezas recicladas que pertenecen a la acción CORTAR Y PEGAR, donde tratamos de reutilizar los residuos, dandoles un nuevo ciclo y haciendo la mayor cantidad de piezas posibles. Piezas únicas.
(35x14 cm)

name: ARMCHAIR DOLORES/BUTACA DOLORES
description:
Armchair 80 x 56 x 48 cm upholstered in a personalized way belonging to the series "Tell me who is seated on you and I'll tell your name"
Very flamenco, passionate, dedicated and sentimental.

Contact with us also to personalize your favourite sofa based in your name, the color of your hair and eyes.

Butaca de 80 x 56 x 48 cm tapizada de forma personalizada perteneciente a la serie "Dime quien se te sienta y te dire como te llamas"
Silla muy flamenca, pasional, entregada y sentimental.

Contacta con nosotros para personalizar tu sofa favorito basándonos en tu nombre y el color de ojos y pelo.

name: LIN & BER
description:
Mosters Lin and Ber. They live in Berlin and like spending all sunday in Mauer park.
Each one is different made with designer's old clothes and customer's also.
Contact with us to became your favorites old clothes in a monster.
